product_name: Quixote PrimaLoft Pillow w/ Pillowcase - Medium - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Enjoy a good night's sleep in camp or on the road with the Quixote medium-size PrimaLoft(R) Pillow with Pillowcase. PrimaLoft synthetic fill creates a plump pillow with plenty of soft give and compressibility. Microfiber shell on the Quixote PrimaLoft(R) Pillow resists water and staining. Cotton pillowcase removes for cleaning. Loop in corner lets you hang up the pillow to air out or dry. Pillow measures 13 in. x 17 in. Machine washable. Closeout.
short_description: Enjoy a good night's sleep in camp or on the road with the Quixote medium-size PrimaLoft(R) Pillow with Pillowcase.
